tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE loan_details (
 loan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 borrower_name VARCHAR(255),
 loan_amount DECIMAL,
 loan_duration INT,
 interest_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE loan_details (
    loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    borrower_name VARCHAR(255),
    loan_amount NUMERIC,
    interest_rate DECIMAL,
    loan_start_date DATE,
    loan_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE payment_schedules (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    loan_id INT,
    payment_date DATE,
    amount_paid NUMERIC,
    payment_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (loan_id) REFERENCES loan_details(loan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE loan_accounts (
    loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    loan_amount DECIMAL,
    interest_rate DECIMAL,
    start_date DATE,
    due_date DATE,
    loan_status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE payment_schedules (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    loan_id INT,
    payment_date DATE,
    payment_amount DECIMAL,
    payment_status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE loan_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    loan_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE LoanDetails (
    loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    loan_amount DECIMAL,
    interest_rate DECIMAL,
    loan_duration INT,
    loan_start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PaymentSchedule (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    loan_id INT,
    payment_date DATE,
    amount_paid DECIMAL,
    payment_status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE LoanAccounts (
    loan_account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    loan_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    outstanding_balance DECIMAL,
    last_payment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE LoanAccounts (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  loan_amount DECIMAL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PaymentSchedules (
  payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  loan_id INT,
  payment_date DATE,
  payment_amount DECIMAL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_loan_id FOREIGN KEY (loan_id) REFERENCES LoanAccounts(loan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  payment_id INT,
  transaction_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL,
  description TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_payment_id FOREIGN KEY (payment_id) REFERENCES PaymentSchedules(payment_id)
);
